## Research Question

What are we trying to learn or validate?

## Motivation

- Why this matters for the LaTeX AI Workflow project
- How it connects to existing goals or roadmap items

## Proposed Approach

- Methods (literature scan, interviews, experiments, benchmarking)
- Tools or data sources
- Estimated effort / timeline

## Expected Outputs

- Deliverables (e.g., summary report, dataset, insights added to `research/`)
- Success indicators or acceptance criteria

- Related issues / discussions:
- Existing documents:
- External resources (papers, blog posts, repos):
